characters.name: werewolf
characters.description: Wake with other werewolfs each night and choose a villager to eat
characters.question: Who do you want to kill?

characters.name: spell_caster
characters.description: Each night, choose a player to silence the following day.
characters.question: Who do you want to cast?

characters.name: bodyguard
characters.description: At night, can protect one person per night and he can protect himself as well
characters.question: Who do you want to protect?

characters.name: Witch
characters.description: You may save of eliminate a player at night, once each per game.

characters.name: hunter
characters.description: If you die, you may immediately kill another player.

characters.name: lycan
characters.description: You are a villager, but you appear to Seer as a Werewolf!
